quest.name: Ethereal Lights
journal: Hayama appears to be deeply engrossed in surveying the seas.
objectives: Survey the designated spots and slay the ominous onibi.

dialogue.name: HAYAMA
dialogue.text: Kami above! Y-You can't just sneak up on someone like that! Now, what is it you need? If you do not require anything, I ask that you kindly allow me to return to watch du─

dialogue.name: HAYAMA
dialogue.text: Ah─at second glance, you appear to be far stronger than the average HyurElezenLalafellMiqo'teRoegadynAu RaHrothgarViera. Perhaps there is something you can help me with. Lately we've been seeing eerie flashing lights along the eastern coast of Sakazuki.

dialogue.name: HAYAMA
dialogue.text: I-It is probably just the ships passing though this area but some of the men here are convinced it is an onibi. They are terrified. Would you go and have a look for us?

dialogue.name: HAYAMA
dialogue.text: The lights were last spotted to the northwest of here. If it turns out to be an onibi, after all, please see that it is dispatched. I-I would go and take care of it myself, of course, but I simply cannot leave my post here.

dialogue.name: HAYAMA
dialogue.text: To the northwest of here is where the lights were last spotted. Please go there and, if there truly is an onibi, see that it is dispatched.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Try as you might, you do not spot any ominous onibi.

dialogue.name: HAYAMA
dialogue.text: So you mean to say there was no onibi─only tiny little fire sprites?

dialogue.name: HAYAMA
dialogue.text: Hahahaha! I cannot wait to reveal the news to the others. They will feel so foolish for being frightened!

dialogue.name: HAYAMA
dialogue.text: A reward, you say? Is the act of doing a kind deed for a fellow man not reward enough? Hahaha! I am just joking, of course. Here you go!
